messages.messageBody:
http://www9.ocn.ne.jp/~durahan/0001.htm
ANIME/MANGA quality "fanart"---simply incredible skill/dedication
It is all Hijikata however I did spot PMK Saitou

*also first ever...Jules Brunet fanart
who is Jules Brunet? French military man who was at Ezo and actually
mentioned Hijikata Toshizo in his writings---
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ/message/2004

but if you just want to see a pic of Jules Brunet
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/JB.jpg
